_header: Of holy fathers in the life
_description: Thais, in the Scottish Legendary — in couplets

CULGg26.First Lines:
Of holy faderis in þe lyfeane wthyre tale I fand
                    ryfe…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…& þare scho helpe ws to winebut det schame &
                    dedly syne
CULGg26.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Barbours des schottischen Nationaldichters Legendensammlung.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 2.79-83.
Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth
                century….
             6 pts. in 3 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
         13, 18, 23, 25, 35, 37. Edinburgh, London: Blackwood, 1896: 2.215-22.
